title: Dropbox: rclone repeatedly uploads the same file even though the file has the same content as the old file but a different modification time
body:
#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?
rclone repeatedly uploads the same file even though the file has the same content (same checksum) as the old file but a different modification time.

##### How to reproduce
1. Create a text file with one character in it.
2. Wait until files are synchronised.
3. Wait for a period of time larger than `--max-window`.
4. Modify the file modification time without modifying the content.
5. Sync using rclone.
6. Sync again to see it being re-uploaded.
Note that the modification time shown on the Dropbox web interface will not change after synchronisation using rclone.

#### What is your rclone version
Problem is reproducible on both rclone stable v1.40 and rclone beta.
```
rclone v1.40-045-g0358e9e7
- os/arch: windows/amd64
- go version: go1.10
```

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits
Windows 7 SP1, 64 bit

####  Which cloud storage system are you using?
Dropbox

#### The command you were trying to run
Please refer to the log below.

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag
```
2018/04/06 15:35:51 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.40-045-g0358e9e7" starting with parameters ["<omitted>\\rclone\\rclone.exe" "sync" "-vv" "--checkers=2" "--config" "cf" "--delete-during" "--modify-window=2m" "--stats=5s" "--transfers=2" "--verbose" "C:\\Users\\<omitted>\\Dropbox\\Test" "<omitted>:Test"]
2018/04/06 15:35:51 DEBUG : Using config file from "<omitted>"
2018/04/06 15:35:52 INFO  : Dropbox root 'Test': Modify window is 2m0s
2018/04/06 15:35:52 INFO  : Waiting for deletions to finish
2018/04/06 15:35:53 DEBUG : a.txt: Modification times differ by -3m39.4866604s:
2018-04-06 15:27:46.4866604 +0800 +08, 2018-04-06 07:24:07 +0000 UTC
2018/04/06 15:35:53 INFO  : Dropbox root 'Test': Waiting for checks to finish
2018/04/06 15:35:53 DEBUG : a.txt: src and dst identical but can't set mod time without re-uploading
2018/04/06 15:35:53 INFO  : Dropbox root 'Test': Waiting for transfers to finish

2018/04/06 15:35:54 INFO  : a.txt: Copied (replaced existing)
2018/04/06 15:35:54 INFO  :
Transferred:      1 Bytes (0 Bytes/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 1
Transferred:            1
Elapsed time:       19.7s

2018/04/06 15:35:54 DEBUG : 6 go routines active
2018/04/06 15:35:54 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.40-045-g0358e9e7" finishing with parameters ["<omitted>\\rclone\\rclone.exe" "sync" "-vv" "--checkers=2" "--config" "cf" "--delete-during" "--modify-window=2m" "--stats=5s" "--transfers=2" "--verbose" "C:\\Users\\<omitted>\\Dropbox\\Test" "<omitted>:Test"]
```
